docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for the Local Actor API v2.

docs.title: Local Actor API v2 2.0.0
docs.text:
Local Actor API for managing certificates, subscriptions, deliveries, and capabilities. This API provides endpoints for actor-based certificate management and message routing.

Contact: API Support support@example.com License: MIT

docs.title: Servers
docs.text: Description URL Local development server http://localhost

docs.title: POST /{actorCommonName}/x509/csr
docs.text:
Sign Certificate Signing Request

Description

Submits a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) for signing and returns the signed certificate chain. The response includes the client certificate, intermediate certificates, and root certificate.

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description actorCommonName path string No The common name of the actor

Request body

application/json 
{
    "csr": "LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURSBSRVFVRVNULS0tLS0K..."
}
Schema of the request body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "csr": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Base64 encoded PEM Certificate Signing Request",
            "example": "LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURSBSRVFVRVNULS0tLS0K..."
        }
    }
}

Response 200 OK

application/json 
{
    "certificates": [
        "LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURS0tLS0t...",
        "LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURS0tLS0t..."
    ]
}
Schema of the response body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "certificates": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "Array of base64 encoded PEM certificates. The first element contains \nthe client certificate, followed by intermediate certificates, and \nfinally the root certificate.\n",
            "items": {
                "type": "string"
            },
            "example": [
                "LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURS0tLS0t...",
                "LS0tLS1CRUdJTiBDRVJUSUZJQ0FURS0tLS0t..."
            ]
        }
    }
}

Response 400 Bad Request

Refer to the common response description: BadRequest.

Response 404 Not Found

Refer to the common response description: NotFound.

Response 500 Internal Server Error

Refer to the common response description: InternalServerError.

docs.title: POST /{actorCommonName}/subscriptions
docs.text:
Create Subscription

Description

Creates a new subscription for the specified actor with the given selector

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description actorCommonName path string No The common name of the actor

Request body

application/json 
{
    "selector": "messageType=traffic AND quadTree=1234"
}
Schema of the request body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "selector": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Query selector for subscription filtering",
            "example": "messageType=traffic AND quadTree=1234"
        }
    }
}

Response 200 OK

application/json 

{
    "id": "subscription-123",
    "selector": "messageType=traffic AND quadTree=1234",
    "status": "CREATED",
    "endpoints": [
        {
            "host": "localhost",
            "port": 8080,
            "source": "source-123",
            "maxBandwidth": 1000000,
            "maxMessageRate": 100
        }
    ],
    "lastUpdatedTimestamp": 1674648600
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "id": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Unique identifier for the subscription",
            "example": "subscription-123"
        },
        "selector": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Query selector used for this subscription",
            "example": "messageType=traffic AND quadTree=1234"
        },
        "status": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Current status of the subscription",
            "enum": [
                "REQUESTED",
                "CREATED",
                "ILLEGAL",
                "NOT_VALID",
                "NO_OVERLAP",
                "RESUBSCRIBE"
            ],
            "example": "CREATED"
        },
        "endpoints": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "List of endpoints for this subscription",
            "items": {
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/SubscriptionEndpoint"
            }
        },
        "lastUpdatedTimestamp": {
            "type": "integer",
            "description": "Unix timestamp of last update",
            "example": 1674648600
        }
    }
}

Response 400 Bad Request

Refer to the common response description: BadRequest.

Response 404 Not Found

Refer to the common response description: NotFound.

Response 500 Internal Server Error

Refer to the common response description: InternalServerError.

docs.title: GET /{actorCommonName}/subscriptions/capabilities
docs.text:
Get Subscription Capabilities

Description

Retrieves available capabilities for subscriptions

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description actorCommonName path string No The common name of the actor selector query string No Query selector for filtering capabilities

Response 200 OK

application/json 

[
    {
        "application": {
            "messageType": "traffic",
            "protocolVersion": "1.0",
            "publisherId": "publisher-123",
            "publicationId": "pub-456",
            "originatingCountry": "SE",
            "quadTree": [
                "1234",
                "5678"
            ]
        },
        "metadata": {
            "shardCount": 4,
            "infoURL": "https://example.com/info",
            "redirectPolicy": "OPTIONAL",
            "maxBandwidth": 1000000,
            "maxMessageRate": 100,
            "repetitionInterval": 60
        }
    }
]
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "type": "array",
    "items": {
        "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Capability"
    }
}

Response 400 Bad Request

Refer to the common response description: BadRequest.

Response 404 Not Found

Refer to the common response description: NotFound.

Response 500 Internal Server Error

Refer to the common response description: InternalServerError.

docs.title: POST /{actorCommonName}/deliveries
docs.text:

    "selector": "messageType=alert AND priority=high"
}

    "properties": {

            "example": "messageType=alert AND priority=high"

}

    "selector": "messageType=alert AND priority=high",
    "status": "CREATED",

            "target": "target-456",
            "selector": "priority=high",

docs.title: POST /{actorCommonName}/capabilities
docs.text:
Create Capability

Description

Creates a new capability for the specified actor

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description actorCommonName path string No The common name of the actor

Request body

application/json 

{
    "application": {
        "messageType": "traffic",
        "protocolVersion": "1.0",
        "publisherId": "publisher-123",
        "publicationId": "pub-456",
        "originatingCountry": "SE",
        "quadTree": [
            "1234",
            "5678"
        ]
    },
    "metadata": {
        "shardCount": 4,
        "infoURL": "https://example.com/info",
        "redirectPolicy": "OPTIONAL",
        "maxBandwidth": 1000000,
        "maxMessageRate": 100,
        "repetitionInterval": 60
    }
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the request body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "application": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "messageType": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Type of message this capability handles",
                    "example": "traffic"
                },
                "protocolVersion": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Version of the protocol",
                    "example": "1.0"
                },
                "publisherId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Unique identifier of the publisher",
                    "example": "publisher-123"
                },
                "publicationId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Unique identifier of the publication",
                    "example": "pub-456"
                },
                "originatingCountry": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code",
                    "example": "SE"
                },
                "quadTree": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "Quadtree identifiers for geographical areas",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    },
                    "example": [
                        "1234",
                        "5678"
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "metadata": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "shardCount": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "Number of shards for load distribution",
                    "default": 1,
                    "example": 4
                },
                "infoURL": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "URL providing additional information",
                    "example": "https://example.com/info"
                },
                "redirectPolicy": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Policy for handling redirects",
                    "enum": [
                        "OPTIONAL",
                        "MANDATORY",
                        "UNAVAILABLE"
                    ],
                    "example": "OPTIONAL"
                },
                "maxBandwidth": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "Maximum bandwidth in bytes per second",
                    "example": 1000000
                },
                "maxMessageRate": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "Maximum messages per second",
                    "example": 100
                },
                "repetitionInterval": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "Interval between repetitions in seconds",
                    "example": 60
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

Response 200 OK

application/json Schema of the response body 
{
    "allOf": [
        {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Unique identifier for the capability",
                    "example": "capability-789"
                }
            }
        },
        {
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Capability"
        }
    ]
}

Response 400 Bad Request

Refer to the common response description: BadRequest.

Response 404 Not Found

Refer to the common response description: NotFound.

Response 500 Internal Server Error

Refer to the common response description: InternalServerError.

docs.title: Common responses
docs.text: This section describes common responses that are reused across operations.

docs.title: BadRequest
docs.text:
Bad Request - Invalid input parameters

application/json 
{
    "error": "VALIDATION_ERROR",
    "message": "Invalid request parameters",
    "timestamp": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
}
Schema of the response body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "error": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Error type identifier",
            "example": "VALIDATION_ERROR"
        },
        "message": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Human-readable error message",
            "example": "Invalid selector format"
        },
        "details": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Additional error details",
            "example": "Selector must follow the format 'key=value AND key2=value2'"
        },
        "timestamp": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time",
            "description": "Timestamp when the error occurred",
            "example": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
        }
    }
}

docs.title: NotFound
docs.text:
Not Found - Resource not found

application/json 
{
    "error": "NOT_FOUND",
    "message": "Resource not found",
    "timestamp": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
}
Schema of the response body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "error": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Error type identifier",
            "example": "VALIDATION_ERROR"
        },
        "message": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Human-readable error message",
            "example": "Invalid selector format"
        },
        "details": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Additional error details",
            "example": "Selector must follow the format 'key=value AND key2=value2'"
        },
        "timestamp": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time",
            "description": "Timestamp when the error occurred",
            "example": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
        }
    }
}

docs.title: InternalServerError
docs.text:
Internal Server Error - Unexpected server error

application/json 
{
    "error": "INTERNAL_ERROR",
    "message": "An unexpected error occurred",
    "timestamp": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
}
Schema of the response body 
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "error": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Error type identifier",
            "example": "VALIDATION_ERROR"
        },
        "message": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Human-readable error message",
            "example": "Invalid selector format"
        },
        "details": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Additional error details",
            "example": "Selector must follow the format 'key=value AND key2=value2'"
        },
        "timestamp": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time",
            "description": "Timestamp when the error occurred",
            "example": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
        }
    }
}

docs.title: Common parameters
docs.text: This section describes common parameters that are reused across operations.

docs.text: Name In Type Default Nullable Description actorCommonName path string No

docs.text: Name Description Certificates Certificate management operations Subscriptions Subscription management operations Deliveries Delivery management operations Capabilities Capability management operations
